unnormalised: Alright folks, buckle up! The Indian automotive scene is hotter than a Delhi summer right now. We've got launches galore!
normalised: Alright folks, buckle up! The Indian automotive scene is hotter than a Delhi summer right now. We have got launches galore!

unnormalised: First up, Mahindra just unveiled the "Sherni," a compact SUV aimed squarely at the young 'uns. Expected price? Around Rs. 8 Lakhs ex-showroom. Word is it's got a panoramic sunroof bigger than my drawing room (which is about 200 sq ft!).
normalised: First up, Mahindra just unveiled the "Sherni," a compact S U V aimed squarely at the young ones. Expected price? Around rupees eight lakhs ex-showroom. Word is it has got a panoramic sunroof bigger than my drawing room (which is about two hundred square feet!).

unnormalised: Tata isn't sleeping either. They're teasing a new electric variant of the Nexon, rumored to have a range of over 400 km. Dr. Sharma from ARAI even gave it a thumbs up!
normalised: Tata is not sleeping either. They are teasing a new electric variant of the Nexon, rumored to have a range of over four hundred kilometer. Doctor Sharma from A R A I even gave it a thumbs up!

unnormalised: Then there's Maruti Suzuki, launching a limited edition of the WagonR, decked out in vibrant Holi colors. Talk about making a statement!
normalised: Then there is Maruti Suzuki, launching a limited edition of the WagonR, decked out in vibrant Holi colors. Talk about making a statement!

unnormalised: And finally, some whispers about a new Jawa motorcycle, possibly a scrambler, inspired by the Himalayan trails. Let's hope it lives up to the hype! So much happening in the auto world; time to start saving those rupees!
normalised: And finally, some whispers about a new Jawa motorcycle, possibly a scrambler, inspired by the Himalayan trails. Let us hope it lives up to the hype! So much happening in the auto world; time to start saving those rupees!
